result.title: EVERYWH2ERE Demonstration tracking tool and KPIs Panel
result.description: Realization of an Excel Sheet to be accessible to all the partners to monitor where the gensets will be installed and their performances in terms of KPIs (both KPIs of the project to evaluate the achievement of objectives and KPIs to evaluate genset general impact). This tracking took will be constantly updated during the project lifetime and included as annex of D1.6, D2.2, D8.3, D4.4, D4.5, D4.6, D4.7, D4.8, D4.9, D8.4. This tool has the objective of tracking the status of the installation and deployment of the genset and it will work as a mean of verification and reporting of the achievement of the project KPIs.
